issue.title: [Plasma] Remove reference to logging.h from plasma/common.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4249](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4249). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It is not needed there and pollutes the namespace for applications that use the plasma client it with arrow's DCHECK macros (DCHECK is a name widely used in other projects).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4249?focusedCommentId=16741688) by Robert Nishihara (robertnishihara):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3392
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3392>
